sentences.sContent: We registered at a three star hotel near the airport.
sentences.sCn: 我们在机场附近的一家三星级旅馆登记投宿。

sentences.sContent: Most of our forces have concentrated near the station.
sentences.sCn: 我们大部分兵力集结在车站附近。

sentences.sContent: Contractors have started building on waste land near the town.
sentences.sCn: 承包商在城附近的荒地上开始从事营造业。

phrases.pCn: 走进；险些；可与…相比（多用于否定句）

trans.tranOther: only a short distance from a person or thing
